product.title: Toad Eats Out | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
It’s Toad’s birthday. And he can do what he wants. And what he wants to do is to check out some restaurants in Toad Eats Out. But when Toad arrives, he gets a surprise. Cat is there with all the guys. It’s a surprise party! Once again Susan Schade and Jon Buller team up to create a story with memorable verse and wonderful pictures. Toad Eats Out< is sure to be a bookshelf favorite.

Tie-in Activity: Let your child “choose” one of the menu items in the book for a story-inspired meal. (As chef, you get to decide just how “Jumbo Gumbo a la Pat” is made.) Or, depending on your baby’s feeding stage, point out Toad eating, then let your baby use a spoon to mimic the picture.
